metadata.titleEn: Long time series night time light remote sensing dataset for the Sahel-Sudano-Guinean region of Africa (1992-2020)
metadata.titleCn: 赤道北部非洲与萨赫勒地区长时间序列夜光遥感数据集（1992-2020）
metadata.description: This data set includes year-by-year nighttime light annual images (totally 28 images) in Northern Equatorial Africa and Sahel from 1992 to 2020. By establishing the calibration relationship by fitting the median NPP-VIIRS nighttime light radiance and the DMSP-OLS nighttime light DN values, the DMSP-OLS nighttime light stable data from 1992 to 2013 were calibrated, and the synthesized DMSP-OLS data after 2013 are generated based on NPP-VIIRS nighttime light data.  The spatial resolution is 0.00833 ° (about 1km); Raster data type is GeoTIFF. The grid pixel value is radiance with unit 10 − 9 w ∙ cm − 2 ∙ sr − 1. This data set can be used for the study on human activities in Northern Equatorial Africa and Sahel, such as the analysis of temporal and spatial changes of human activities.
metadata.descriptionCn: 该数据集包含1992年至2020年间逐年赤道北部非洲与萨赫勒地区夜光辐亮度数据影像。数据集通过建立DMSP-OLS夜光遥感数据DN值和NPP-VIIRS夜光遥感数据辐亮度对应关系校正1992年至2013年的DMSP-OLS稳定光夜光遥感影像数据，并基于NPP-VIIRS夜光数据模拟合成2013年以后的DMSP-OLS稳定光夜光数据构建而成。数据空间分辨率为0.00833°（约1km），数据类型为GEOTIFF。栅格像元值为辐亮度，单位为10−9 W∙cm−2∙sr−1。该数据集可用于赤道北部非洲与萨赫勒地区的人类活动相关研究，如人类活动时空变化分析。
metadata.instructions:
File naming: the data is stored in GeoTIFF format. The file name is "mc_annual_ntl_yyyy. TIF", where yyyy represents the year.
Data reading method: software or computer language that can read GeoTIFF can read the data, such as ArcGIS, envi, IDL, python, MATLAB, etc.

background: Recently, the northern Equatorial Africa and Sahel region has been a hot spot in global environmental issues. Besides being influenced by climate, such as rainfall variability, the influence of human activities has been critical in determining the impact of recurrent drought spells and in enhancing environmental degradation in the Sahel. Nighttime light remote sensing is a useful technology to capture the temporal and spatial distribution of human activities and has been widely applied in urbanization studies, socio-economic assessments, and natural and humanitarian disasters monitoring. The Defense Meteorological Satellite Program (DMSP) Operational Linescan System (OLS) acquired a nighttime light data record, spanning from 1992 to 2013, which is the longest available time series of nighttime light data with irreplaceable relevance for multiple applications. Since 2013 the successor of DMSP-OLS is the National Polar-orbiting Partnership (NPP) Visible Infrared Imaging Radiometer Suite (VIIRS) that records nighttime light radiance at unprecedented radiometric resolution and accuracy using a dedicated spectral band with 14-bit radiometric resolution. Compared with DMSP-OLS nighttime light data, the NPP-VIIRS nighttime light data have notably improved in the following aspects: (1) VIIRS has a much finer spatial resolution of 742 m (across full scan) than the 2.7 km (at nadir) of OLS; (2) VIIRS is characterized by a much smaller minimum detectable radiance than OLS; (3) VIIRS has on-board calibration, thus measuring radiance accurately, while OLS does not. (4) VIIRS overcomes the saturation problem, which is evident in OLS data, with a much wider dynamic range. The challenge to construct an extended time series on nighttime light is, therefore, to inter-calibrate the 6-bit OLS data in arbitrary units (DN-s) to the 14-bit very accurate VIIRS radiance.
research objective: Our study helps to bridge the gap between the DMSP-OLS data available until 2013 and the NPP-VIIRS data available since 2013.
challenges: Other studies used daily or monthly DMSP-OLS nighttime light data, which makes it easier to construct a data set of simultaneous observations, but is difficult to obtain. Due to the huge difference in overpass time (9 hours) between the extension data and the original global DMSP-OLS nighttime lights time series, it is difficult to use them to get a consistent DMSP-OLS DN time series. In addition, few studies generated long time series nighttime light radiance data.
methods: The approach to calibrate the OLS data includes three steps: a) inter-calibrate the OLS DN data acquired by different sensors in 1992–2013; b) calibrate the OLS DN data using VIIRS data in 2013; c) generate synthetic OLS radiance data by degrading the VIIRS data in 2013–2020. We generated a) a time series of calibrated OLS nighttime light radiance data (1992–2013); b) mean annual VIIRS radiance on stable lights at the OLS spatial resolution for 2013–2020; c) synthetic OLS radiance data generated using VIIRS radiance data degraded to match the radiometric specifications of OLS for 2013–2020.
dataset: We used the DMSP-OLS annual image data product on stable lights extracted from DMSP-OLS Nighttime Lights Time Series Version 4 (from 1992 to 2013) and NPP-VIIRS monthly data on nighttime lights Version 1 (from 2013 to 2020). DMSP-OLS measures nighttime light signals with a 6-bit quantization radiometric resolution in arbitrary units, i.e. digital numbers (DNs), at a spatial resolution of 2.7 km (at nadir without geolocation errors), using the panchromatic visible near-infrared (VNIR) band (0.4–1.1 μm). The NPP-VIIRS monthly nighttime light data product is gridded to 0.0042° (~500 m) geographic grids by filtering and averaging the actual daily VIIRS radiometric data to filter out the effects of stray light, lightning and moonlight.
findings: The evaluation of these data products in 2013 documented their accuracy and consistency.
backgroundCn: 最近，北部赤道非洲和萨赫尔地区成为全球环境问题的热点。除了受到气候（如降雨变异）的影响外，人类活动的影响在决定反复干旱的影响和加剧萨赫尔地区环境退化方面也至关重要。夜间灯光遥感是一种有用的技术，可以捕捉人类活动的时间和空间分布，已广泛应用于城市化研究、社会经济评估以及自然和人道主义灾害监测。国防气象卫星计划（DMSP）操作线扫描系统（OLS）获取的夜间灯光数据记录，跨越1992年至2013年，是可用的最长夜间灯光数据时间序列，对多种应用具有不可替代的相关性。自2013年以来，DMSP-OLS的继任者是国家极地轨道合作伙伴（NPP）可见光红外成像辐射计组（VIIRS），该系统以空前的辐射分辨率和准确性记录夜间灯光辐射，使用专用的光谱波段，具有14位的辐射分辨率。与DMSP-OLS夜间灯光数据相比，NPP-VIIRS夜间灯光数据在以下几个方面显著改善：（1）VIIRS的空间分辨率为742米（全扫描），而OLS为2.7公里（在天顶）；（2）VIIRS的最小可检测辐射明显小于OLS；（3）VIIRS具有机载校准，因此能够准确测量辐射，而OLS则没有；（4）VIIRS克服了OLS数据中明显存在的饱和问题，具有更宽的动态范围。因此，构建夜间灯光扩展时间序列的挑战在于将6位OLS数据（以任意单位表示）与14位非常准确的VIIRS辐射进行互标定。
research objectiveCn: 我们的研究有助于弥补2013年之前可用的DMSP-OLS数据与2013年之后可用的NPP-VIIRS数据之间的差距。
challengesCn: 其他研究使用了每日或每月的DMSP-OLS夜间灯光数据，这使得构建同时观测的数据集变得更容易，但获取这些数据较为困难。由于扩展数据与原始全球DMSP-OLS夜间灯光时间序列之间存在9小时的巨大过境时间差，因此很难将它们用于获取一致的DMSP-OLS DN时间序列。此外，生成长期夜间灯光辐射数据的研究也很少。
methodsCn: 校准OLS数据的方法包括三个步骤：a) 对1992年至2013年间由不同传感器获取的OLS DN数据进行互校准；b) 使用2013年的VIIRS数据对OLS DN数据进行校准；c) 通过将2013年至2020年的VIIRS数据降级生成合成OLS辐射数据。我们生成了：a) 一系列经过校准的OLS夜间灯光辐射数据（1992-2013）；b) 2013年至2020年在OLS空间分辨率下稳定灯光的VIIRS辐射年均值；c) 使用降级到匹配OLS辐射特性的VIIRS辐射数据生成的合成OLS辐射数据（2013-2020）。
datasetCn: 我们使用了DMSP-OLS年度影像数据产品，提取了来自DMSP-OLS夜间灯光时间序列第4版（1992年至2013年）的稳定灯光数据，以及NPP-VIIRS月度夜间灯光数据产品第1版（2013年至2020年）。DMSP-OLS以6位量化的辐射分辨率测量夜间光信号，单位为任意单位，即数字数（DN），其空间分辨率为2.7公里（在无地理定位误差的情况下），使用的是全色可见近红外（VNIR）波段（0.4–1.1微米）。NPP-VIIRS月度夜间灯光数据产品被格网化为0.0042°（约500米）地理网格，通过过滤和平均实际的每日VIIRS辐射数据，以过滤掉杂散光、闪电和月光的影响。
findingsCn: 对这些数据产品在2013年的评估记录了它们的准确性和一致性。

Verification.QuestionEn: Is it necessary to inter-calibrate OLS DN data acquired by different sensors from 1992 to 2013 to extend the time series?
Verification.QuestionCn: 在1992年至2013年期间，是否有必要对不同传感器获取的OLS DN数据进行互标定，以延长时间序列？

Verification.QuestionEn: Can NPP-VIIRS data be used to calibrate and generate synthetic OLS radiance data for the period after 2013?
Verification.QuestionCn: NPP-VIIRS数据可以用于校准和生成2013年后时期的合成OLS辐射数据吗？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is it challenging to obtain daily or monthly DMSP-OLS nighttime light data for generating simultaneous observations?
Verification.QuestionCn: 获取每日或每月的DMSP-OLS夜间灯光数据以生成同步观测是否具有挑战性？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is the calibration of nighttime light data more reliably achieved by inter-sensor calibration, radiance calibration using VIIRS data, or synthetic generation of OLS data?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 夜间灯光数据的校准是通过传感器间校准、使用VIIRS数据的辐射校准，还是通过合成生成OLS数据更可靠？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Which time series approach is more challenging to maintain consistency: using daily, monthly, or annual nighttime light data?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 哪种时间序列方法在保持一致性方面更具挑战性：使用每日、每月还是每年夜间灯光数据？

Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 对OLS DN数据进行互校准

Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 谁可以在研究中受益于使用夜间灯光遥感数据？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where is the spatial resolution difference between DMSP-OLS and NPP-VIIRS most significant?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: DMSP-OLS和NPP-VIIRS之间的空间分辨率差异在哪里最为显著？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to inter-calibrate different nighttime light data sources over time?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于对不同夜间光源数据进行时间间隔校准的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: The approach to calibrate the OLS data includes three steps: a) inter-calibrate the OLS DN data acquired by different sensors in 1992–2013; b) calibrate the OLS DN data using VIIRS data in 2013; c) generate synthetic OLS radiance data by degrading the VIIRS data in 2013–2020.
Example.AnswerCn: 校准OLS数据的方法包括三个步骤：a) 对1992-2013年间由不同传感器获取的OLS DN数据进行互校准；b) 使用2013年的VIIRS数据对OLS DN数据进行校准；c) 通过降级2013-2020年的VIIRS数据生成合成的OLS辐射数据。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced in generating a consistent long-term time series of nighttime light radiance data?
Example.QuestionCn: 生成一致的长期夜间光辐射数据时间序列面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge includes the difficulty of obtaining a consistent DMSP-OLS DN time series due to the significant difference in overpass time (9 hours) between the extension data and the original global DMSP-OLS nighttime lights time series.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个挑战是由于扩展数据和原始全球DMSP-OLS夜间灯光时间序列之间存在9小时的过境时间差异，导致获取一致的DMSP-OLS DN时间序列变得困难。

Example.QuestionEn: Provide an example of datasets used to analyze spatial and temporal human activities in the northern Equatorial Africa and Sahel region.
Example.QuestionCn: 提供用于分析北赤道非洲和萨赫勒地区空间和时间人类活动的数据集示例。
Example.AnswerEn: We used the DMSP-OLS annual image data product on stable lights extracted from DMSP-OLS Nighttime Lights Time Series Version 4 (from 1992 to 2013) and NPP-VIIRS monthly data on nighttime lights Version 1 (from 2013 to 2020).
Example.AnswerCn: 我们使用了DMSP-OLS年度图像数据产品，提取了来自DMSP-OLS夜间灯光时间序列版本4（1992年至2013年）的稳定灯光，以及NPP-VIIRS月度数据的夜间灯光版本1（2013年至2020年）。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What specific challenges are associated with inter-calibrating nighttime light data from different satellite sensors?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 与不同卫星传感器进行夜间光数据的互校准相关的具体挑战有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: significant overpass time difference, limited number of studies generating long time series nighttime light radiance data
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 显著的天桥时间差异，生成长期序列夜间灯光辐射数据的研究数量有限。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What methods are employed to ensure consistency between historical and current nighttime light observations in data collection?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在数据收集过程中，为确保历史和当前夜间灯光观测的一致性，采用了哪些方法？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: inter-calibrating OLS DN data, calibrating OLS DN data with VIIRS data, generating synthetic OLS radiance data by degrading VIIRS data
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 对OLS DN数据进行交叉校准，用VIIRS数据校准OLS DN数据，通过降级VIIRS数据生成合成OLS辐射数据。

Quantification.QuestionCn: NPP-VIIRS收集的夜间光辐射数据的空间分辨率是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many steps are involved in the approach to calibrate the OLS data to construct an extended nighttime light time series?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在校准OLS数据以构建扩展夜间灯光时间序列的过程中涉及多少个步骤？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the radiometric resolution of the DMSP-OLS nighttime light data collected from 1992 to 2013?
Quantification.QuestionCn: DMSP-OLS夜间灯光数据在1992年至2013年期间的辐射分辨率是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is 'inter-calibration' in the context of nighttime light remote sensing data?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在夜间灯光遥感数据的背景下，什么是“互校准”？
Definition.AnswerEn: Inter-calibration in the context of nighttime light remote sensing data refers to the process of aligning and adjusting data from different sensors or instruments to a common scale, ensuring consistency across time. Specifically, it involves calibrating the DMSP-OLS digital number (DN) data acquired by different sensors from 1992 to 2013 and using VIIRS data from 2013 to achieve a continuous and consistent dataset.
Definition.AnswerCn: 夜间灯光遥感数据中的互校准是指将来自不同传感器或仪器的数据对齐和调整到一个共同的尺度，以确保时间上的一致性。具体而言，它涉及对1992年至2013年间不同传感器获取的DMSP-OLS数字数值（DN）数据进行校准，并使用2013年的VIIRS数据来实现连续和一致的数据集。

Definition.QuestionEn: How is 'spatial resolution' significant in nighttime light remote sensing?
Definition.QuestionCn: “空间分辨率”在夜间灯光遥感中有何重要意义？
Definition.AnswerEn: Spatial resolution in nighttime light remote sensing is crucial as it determines the smallest area on the ground that can be distinguished by the sensor. In this field, VIIRS offers a finer spatial resolution of 742 meters compared to the 2.7 kilometers of DMSP-OLS, which affects the accuracy and detail of the captured human activity patterns and environmental changes.
Definition.AnswerCn: 夜间灯光遥感中的空间分辨率至关重要，因为它决定了传感器能够区分的地面上最小区域。 在这一领域，VIIRS提供了742米的更细空间分辨率，而DMSP-OLS则为2.7公里，这影响了捕捉到的人类活动模式和环境变化的准确性和细节。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods for DMSP-OLS nighttime light data compare to those for NPP-VIIRS nighttime light data in terms of radiometric resolution and spatial accuracy?
Comparison.QuestionCn: DMSP-OLS夜间灯光数据的数据显示方法与NPP-VIIRS夜间灯光数据在辐射分辨率和空间精度方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: DMSP-OLS nighttime light data are collected with a 6-bit quantization radiometric resolution in arbitrary units (DNs) at a spatial resolution of 2.7 km, using a panchromatic visible near-infrared band. In contrast, NPP-VIIRS nighttime light data are collected with a 14-bit radiometric resolution, offering finer spatial resolution of 742 m and improved radiometric accuracy due to onboard calibration.
Comparison.AnswerCn: DMSP-OLS夜间灯光数据以6位量化的辐射分辨率在任意单位（DNs）下收集，空间分辨率为2.7公里，使用的是全色可见近红外波段。相比之下，NPP-VIIRS夜间灯光数据以14位辐射分辨率收集，提供742米的更细空间分辨率，并由于机载校准而具有更高的辐射精度。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in challenges faced when using DMSP-OLS versus NPP-VIIRS data for constructing long time series of nighttime light radiance?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用DMSP-OLS与NPP-VIIRS数据构建夜间光辐射长期时间序列时面临的挑战有哪些不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The challenges with DMSP-OLS data include inter-calibrating the 6-bit DN values from different sensors and dealing with the saturation problem, while NPP-VIIRS data offer improved radiometric resolution and accuracy, but require degrading the data to match DMSP-OLS specifications for time series consistency.
Comparison.AnswerCn: DMSP-OLS数据面临的挑战包括对来自不同传感器的6位DN值进行互标定以及处理饱和问题，而NPP-VIIRS数据提供了更好的辐射分辨率和准确性，但需要将数据降级以匹配DMSP-OLS的规格，以保持时间序列的一致性。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the calibration methodologies for DMSP-OLS and NPP-VIIRS data differ in constructing a continuous nighttime light dataset from 1992 to 2020?
Comparison.QuestionCn: DMSP-OLS和NPP-VIIRS数据在构建1992年至2020年的连续夜间灯光数据集时，其校准方法有何不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Calibration methodologies involve inter-calibrating DMSP-OLS DN data from 1992 to 2013 and then using 2013 NPP-VIIRS data to calibrate DMSP-OLS data, followed by generating synthetic OLS radiance data by degrading VIIRS data from 2013 to 2020, ensuring consistency across the dataset.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 校准方法涉及对1992年至2013年的DMSP-OLS DN数据进行互校准，然后使用2013年的NPP-VIIRS数据来校准DMSP-OLS数据，接着通过将2013年至2020年的VIIRS数据降级生成合成的OLS辐射数据，以确保数据集的一致性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways might synthetic datasets generated from degrading high-resolution data to match older systems be beneficial or problematic in analyzing human activity over long periods?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 通过将高分辨率数据降级以匹配旧系统生成的合成数据集，在分析长期人类活动时可能有哪些好处或问题？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Synthetic datasets generated by degrading high-resolution VIIRS data to match DMSP-OLS specifications can be beneficial in creating consistent long-term datasets, allowing for seamless temporal analysis of human activities. However, this approach can also be problematic as it might introduce errors or reduce the precision of the data, potentially affecting the reliability of analyses. Ensuring accuracy in such synthetic data requires rigorous calibration and validation with existing datasets.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 通过将高分辨率的VIIRS数据降级以匹配DMSP-OLS规格生成的合成数据集，可以在创建一致的长期数据集方面带来好处，从而允许对人类活动进行无缝的时间分析。然而，这种方法也可能存在问题，因为它可能引入错误或降低数据的精度，从而影响分析的可靠性。确保此类合成数据的准确性需要与现有数据集进行严格的校准和验证。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors lead to the challenge of generating a consistent long-term time series of nighttime light radiance data?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致生成一致的长期夜间光辐射数据时间序列的挑战的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The challenge arises due to the significant difference in overpass time between the DMSP-OLS data and the extension data, making it difficult to obtain a consistent DN time series. Additionally, few studies have generated long time series of nighttime light radiance data.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 由于DMSP-OLS数据与扩展数据之间的过境时间差异显著，因此很难获得一致的DN时间序列。此外，生成夜间光辐射数据的长期时间序列的研究较少。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is inter-calibration necessary when constructing an extended time series of nighttime light data?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在构建延长的夜间灯光数据时间序列时，为什么需要进行互校准？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Inter-calibration is necessary to bridge the gap between the 6-bit OLS data in arbitrary units and the 14-bit accurate VIIRS radiance. This process ensures consistency and accuracy across the different datasets from 1992 to 2020.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 交叉校准是必要的，以弥合1992年至2020年间6位OLS数据（以任意单位表示）与14位准确的VIIRS辐射数据之间的差距。这个过程确保了不同数据集之间的一致性和准确性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes difficulties in obtaining daily or monthly DMSP-OLS nighttime light data for long-term analysis?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 获取长期分析所需的每日或每月DMSP-OLS夜间灯光数据的困难原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Obtaining daily or monthly DMSP-OLS nighttime light data is difficult due to the challenges in constructing a dataset of simultaneous observations. The large difference in overpass time between the datasets further complicates achieving consistent data for long-term analysis.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 获取每日或每月的DMSP-OLS夜间灯光数据是困难的，因为构建同时观测的数据集面临挑战。数据集之间的过境时间差异较大，进一步使得实现长期分析的一致数据变得复杂。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of inter-calibrating DMSP-OLS data with NPP-VIIRS data for long-term nighttime light studies?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 对DMSP-OLS数据与NPP-VIIRS数据进行互校准对长期夜间光研究的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Inter-calibrating DMSP-OLS data with NPP-VIIRS data allows for the creation of a consistent time series, extending the nighttime light dataset beyond 2013. This enables more accurate studies on temporal and spatial changes in human activities in regions like northern Equatorial Africa and the Sahel, improving insights into urbanization and socio-economic dynamics.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 对DMSP-OLS数据与NPP-VIIRS数据进行交叉校准，可以创建一个一致的时间序列，将夜间灯光数据集扩展到2013年之前。这使得对赤道北部非洲和萨赫勒地区人类活动的时间和空间变化进行更准确的研究成为可能，从而改善对城市化和社会经济动态的洞察。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the transition from DMSP-OLS to NPP-VIIRS data affect the spatial resolution of nighttime light data analysis?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: DMSP-OLS到NPP-VIIRS数据的过渡如何影响夜间光数据分析的空间分辨率？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The transition to NPP-VIIRS data significantly enhances the spatial resolution of nighttime light data analysis from 2.7 km to approximately 742 m. This improvement allows for more detailed and precise mapping of human activities, which could lead to better monitoring and understanding of urban growth and socio-economic trends.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: NPP-VIIRS数据的过渡显著提高了夜间灯光数据分析的空间分辨率，从2.7公里提升至约742米。这一改进使得对人类活动的详细和精确映射成为可能，从而有助于更好地监测和理解城市增长和社会经济趋势。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives behind inter-calibrating OLS DN data with VIIRS data for creating a long-term nighttime light radiance dataset?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 对OLS DN数据与VIIRS数据进行互标定的目标是什么，以创建长期的夜间光辐射数据集？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to bridge the gap between the DMSP-OLS data available until 2013 and the NPP-VIIRS data available since 2013, to construct an extended time series on nighttime light data that can be used for various applications, such as human activity analysis in the northern Equatorial Africa and Sahel region.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是弥补2013年之前可用的DMSP-OLS数据与2013年开始可用的NPP-VIIRS数据之间的差距，以构建一个扩展的夜间光数据时间序列，可用于各种应用，例如分析北赤道非洲和萨赫尔地区的人类活动。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the goal of generating synthetic OLS radiance data using VIIRS data for the years following 2013?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用VIIRS数据生成2013年之后年份的合成OLS辐射数据的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal is to simulate the older DMSP-OLS nighttime light data characteristics using newer VIIRS data, allowing for the continuation of a consistent nighttime light dataset that maintains the radiometric specifications of OLS, which is essential for long-term studies and analyses of human activity patterns.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是使用较新的VIIRS数据模拟旧版DMSP-OLS夜间灯光数据的特征，从而实现一致的夜间灯光数据集的延续，并保持OLS的辐射特性，这对于长期研究和人类活动模式分析至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the key steps involved in calibrating historical nighttime light data to achieve consistency with current high-resolution datasets?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 校准历史夜间灯光数据以实现与当前高分辨率数据集一致性的关键步骤是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The approach to calibrate the OLS data includes three steps: a) inter-calibrate the OLS DN data acquired by different sensors in 1992–2013; b) calibrate the OLS DN data using VIIRS data in 2013; c) generate synthetic OLS radiance data by degrading the VIIRS data in 2013–2020.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 校准OLS数据的方法包括三个步骤：a) 对1992-2013年间由不同传感器获取的OLS DN数据进行互校准；b) 使用2013年的VIIRS数据对OLS DN数据进行校准；c) 通过降级2013-2020年的VIIRS数据生成合成的OLS辐射数据。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How do researchers overcome the challenge of different overpass times when constructing a consistent time series from multiple nighttime light data sources?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 研究人员如何克服不同过境时间的挑战，以便从多个夜间灯光数据源构建一致的时间序列？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Researchers face the challenge of a huge difference in overpass times (9 hours) between extension data and original global DMSP-OLS nighttime lights time series. To address this, they calibrate the OLS DN data using VIIRS data to create synthetic OLS radiance data that match the radiometric specifications of OLS.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 研究人员面临着扩展数据和原始全球DMSP-OLS夜间灯光时间序列之间有9小时的巨大过境时间差异的挑战。为了解决这个问题，他们使用VIIRS数据对OLS DN数据进行校准，以创建与OLS的辐射特性相匹配的合成OLS辐射数据。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural methods are used to filter out interference such as stray light or moonlight in nighttime light data collection?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在夜间光数据收集过程中，使用了哪些程序方法来过滤干扰，例如杂散光或月光？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The NPP-VIIRS monthly nighttime light data product is gridded to 0.0042° (~500 m) geographic grids by filtering and averaging the actual daily VIIRS radiometric data to filter out the effects of stray light, lightning, and moonlight.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: NPP-VIIRS月夜间灯光数据产品被格网化为0.0042°（约500米）地理网格，通过过滤和平均实际的日VIIRS辐射数据，以过滤掉杂散光、闪电和月光的影响。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What techniques enable the calibration of datasets from different satellite sensors to ensure continuity and accuracy in nighttime light data analysis?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术可以使来自不同卫星传感器的数据集进行校准，以确保夜间光数据分析的连续性和准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The approach to calibrate the OLS data includes three steps: a) inter-calibrate the OLS DN data acquired by different sensors in 1992–2013; b) calibrate the OLS DN data using VIIRS data in 2013; c) generate synthetic OLS radiance data by degrading the VIIRS data in 2013–2020.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 校准OLS数据的方法包括三个步骤：a) 对1992-2013年间由不同传感器获取的OLS DN数据进行互校准；b) 使用2013年的VIIRS数据对OLS DN数据进行校准；c) 通过降级2013-2020年的VIIRS数据生成合成的OLS辐射数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do innovations in radiometric resolution contribute to the enhanced measurement of nighttime light data over time?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 辐射分辨率的创新如何促进夜间光数据随时间的增强测量？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The NPP-VIIRS data records nighttime light radiance at unprecedented radiometric resolution and accuracy using a dedicated spectral band with 14-bit radiometric resolution, which is notably improved compared to the 6-bit DMSP-OLS nighttime light data.
Enablement.AnswerCn: NPP-VIIRS数据以空前的辐射分辨率和精度记录夜间光辐射，使用专门的光谱波段，具有14位的辐射分辨率，这相比于6位的DMSP-OLS夜间光数据有显著改善。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is it challenging to construct a consistent long time series of nighttime light radiance data in the context of equatorial northern Africa and the Sahel region?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在赤道北非和萨赫尔地区，构建一致的夜间光辐射数据的长期时间序列面临挑战的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Due to the significant difference in overpass time between the extension data and the original global DMSP-OLS nighttime lights time series, it is difficult to use them to get a consistent DMSP-OLS DN time series. Additionally, generating long time series nighttime light radiance data has been challenging because few studies have focused on this aspect, and previous data sets often used daily or monthly DMSP-OLS nighttime light data that are difficult to obtain.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 由于扩展数据与原始全球DMSP-OLS夜间灯光时间序列之间的过境时间差异显著，因此很难将它们结合起来获得一致的DMSP-OLS DN时间序列。此外，生成长期的夜间灯光辐射数据一直存在挑战，因为很少有研究关注这一方面，之前的数据集通常使用每日或每月的DMSP-OLS夜间灯光数据，而这些数据难以获取。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the inter-calibration of DMSP-OLS data with VIIRS data be essential for extending the nighttime light data time series?
Expectation.QuestionCn: DMSP-OLS数据与VIIRS数据的互校准对于延长夜间光数据时间序列可能是至关重要的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Inter-calibration is essential because the DMSP-OLS data, available until 2013, has a 6-bit quantization radiometric resolution in arbitrary units, making it necessary to calibrate these with the more accurate and higher resolution 14-bit VIIRS radiance data available since 2013. This calibration allows for the creation of synthetic OLS radiance data that aligns with VIIRS data, thus bridging the gap in the time series and improving the accuracy of nighttime light radiance data.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 互校是至关重要的，因为DMSP-OLS数据（可用至2013年）具有6位量化的辐射分辨率，单位为任意单位，因此有必要将其与自2013年以来可用的更准确且分辨率更高的14位VIIRS辐射数据进行校准。这种校准允许创建与VIIRS数据对齐的合成OLS辐射数据，从而弥补时间序列中的空白，提高夜间光辐射数据的准确性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How can the calibration of nighttime light data from different satellite sensors be optimized to ensure consistency and reliability over long time series in this field?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何优化来自不同卫星传感器的夜间灯光数据的校准，以确保在该领域的长期时间序列中保持一致性和可靠性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The calibration can be optimized by inter-calibrating OLS DN data from 1992 to 2013 using VIIRS data from 2013, and generating synthetic OLS radiance data by degrading VIIRS data from 2013 to 2020, ensuring a consistent dataset across different time periods and sensor types.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 通过使用2013年的VIIRS数据对1992年至2013年的OLS DN数据进行互校准，可以优化校准，并通过将2013年的VIIRS数据降级生成合成的OLS辐射数据，确保在不同时间段和传感器类型之间的数据集一致。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the primary challenges in constructing a long time series of nighttime light radiance data, and how can they be addressed in future research?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 构建夜间光辐射数据的长期时间序列面临的主要挑战是什么，以及未来研究中如何解决这些问题？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Primary challenges include the difficulty of obtaining consistent DMSP-OLS DN time series due to differences in overpass times and the limited availability of long time series data. Addressing these challenges involves using a systematic approach to calibrate the data, as described in the steps of inter-calibrating OLS DN data, calibrating with VIIRS data, and generating synthetic radiance data.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 主要挑战包括由于过境时间的差异以及长期时间序列数据的有限可用性，获取一致的DMSP-OLS DN时间序列的困难。解决这些挑战涉及使用系统的方法来校准数据，如在OLS DN数据的互校准步骤、与VIIRS数据的校准以及生成合成辐射数据所述。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't figure out how historical data on nighttime lights is calibrated to ensure consistency across different satellite systems.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法弄清楚夜间灯光的历史数据是如何校准的，以确保不同卫星系统之间的一致性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: A method involves inter-calibrating OLS DN data from 1992-2013, calibrating OLS DN data using VIIRS data in 2013, and generating synthetic OLS radiance data by degrading VIIRS data for 2013-2020.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 该方法涉及对1992-2013年的OLS DN数据进行互标定，使用2013年的VIIRS数据对OLS DN数据进行标定，并通过降级VIIRS数据生成2013-2020年的合成OLS辐射数据。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand what makes it challenging to construct a consistent long-term time series for nighttime light radiance data.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白构建一致的长期夜间灯光辐射数据时间序列有什么挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Challenges include differences in overpass times between extension data and original DMSP-OLS nighttime lights time series, as well as the difficulty in generating long time series of nighttime light radiance data.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 挑战包括扩展数据与原始DMSP-OLS夜间灯光时间序列之间的过境时间差异，以及生成夜间灯光辐射数据的长期时间序列的困难。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the primary datasets used to study human activities using nighttime light data.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定用于研究人类活动的夜间灯光数据的主要数据集。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Primary datasets include the DMSP-OLS annual image data product on stable lights from 1992 to 2013, and the NPP-VIIRS monthly nighttime light data from 2013 to 2020.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 主要数据集包括1992年至2013年的DMSP-OLS年度图像数据产品（稳定光源），以及2013年至2020年的NPP-VIIRS月度夜间光源数据。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please outline a comprehensive method for calibrating DMSP-OLS data using VIIRS data to ensure continuity in nighttime light data series across different sensors.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请概述一种全面的方法，用于使用VIIRS数据校准DMSP-OLS数据，以确保不同传感器之间夜间光数据系列的连续性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The approach to calibrate the OLS data includes three steps: a) inter-calibrate the OLS DN data acquired by different sensors in 1992–2013; b) calibrate the OLS DN data using VIIRS data in 2013; c) generate synthetic OLS radiance data by degrading the VIIRS data in 2013–2020. This method ensures a continuous time series by combining both historical and recent data.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 校准OLS数据的方法包括三个步骤：a) 对1992年至2013年间由不同传感器获取的OLS DN数据进行互校准；b) 使用2013年的VIIRS数据对OLS DN数据进行校准；c) 通过降级2013年至2020年的VIIRS数据生成合成的OLS辐射数据。该方法通过结合历史数据和近期数据，确保了连续的时间序列。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please describe the challenges faced in generating long time series of nighttime light radiance data and propose a potential solution.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请描述生成夜间光辐射数据的长期时间序列所面临的挑战，并提出一个潜在的解决方案。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: One of the main challenges in generating long time series nighttime light radiance data is the huge difference in overpass time (9 hours) between the extension data and the original global DMSP-OLS nighttime lights time series, which makes it difficult to maintain consistency. A potential solution involves generating synthetic OLS radiance data by degrading the VIIRS data to match the radiometric specifications of OLS for the years 2013–2020.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 生成长期夜间灯光辐射数据的主要挑战之一是扩展数据与原始全球DMSP-OLS夜间灯光时间序列之间存在9小时的巨大过境时间差，这使得保持一致性变得困难。一个潜在的解决方案是通过降级VIIRS数据以匹配OLS的辐射规格，从而生成合成的OLS辐射数据，适用于2013年至2020年。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please identify and explain the data collection methods used to compile a long-term dataset essential for studying human activity changes in northern Equatorial Africa and the Sahel region.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请识别并解释用于编制长期数据集的数据收集方法，这些数据集对于研究北赤道非洲和萨赫尔地区人类活动变化至关重要。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The data collection methods involve using DMSP-OLS annual image data product on stable lights from 1992 to 2013, and NPP-VIIRS monthly data on nighttime lights from 2013 to 2020. The DMSP-OLS data uses a 6-bit quantization radiometric resolution, while the NPP-VIIRS data is gridded to 0.0042° geographic grids by filtering and averaging the actual daily VIIRS radiometric data to filter out effects of stray light, lightning, and moonlight, providing a comprehensive view of human activity changes over time.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法涉及使用1992年至2013年的DMSP-OLS年度图像数据产品，分析稳定光源，以及2013年至2020年的NPP-VIIRS月度数据，分析夜间灯光。DMSP-OLS数据使用6位量化的辐射分辨率，而NPP-VIIRS数据则通过过滤和平均实际的每日VIIRS辐射数据，网格化为0.0042°的地理网格，以过滤掉杂散光、闪电和月光的影响，从而提供对人类活动变化的全面视角。
